title: Research paves way for new source for leukemia drug

title_detail.value: Research paves way for new source for leukemia drug

summary: Chemistry researchers have patented a method for making anti-leukemia compounds that until now have only been available via an Asian tree that produces them.

summary_detail.value: Chemistry researchers have patented a method for making anti-leukemia compounds that until now have only been available via an Asian tree that produces them.
